projects.title: DAS - Document Automation Software
projects.description: Python-based document automation system designed for general purpose. Generate customized reports from templates with support for multiple input formats (Excel, CSV, JSON, SQL databases) and output formats (PDF, Word, Excel, HTML). Features advanced template engine with conditional logic, dynamic data binding, variable substitution, batch processing capabilities, and automated scheduling.
